Languages.string: any languages it knew in life

MonsterTrait.Name: Ethereal Sight
MonsterTrait.Text: The phantom warrior can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

MonsterTrait.Name: Incorporeal Movement
MonsterTrait.Text: The phantom warrior can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

MonsterTrait.Name: Spectral Armor and Shield
MonsterTrait.Text: The phantom warrior's AC accounts for its spectral armor and shield.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The phantom warrior makes two attacks with its spectral longsword.

MonsterAction.Name: Spectral Longsword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) force damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Etherealness
MonsterTrait.Text: The phantom warrior enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.
